verses.roman:
'vidyāpūre' nānā-mata loka vaise yata
prabhu-darśane 'vaiṣṇava' haila chāḍi' nija-mata

synonyms: vidyāpūre-in the town of Vidyānagara; nānā-mata-various opinions; loka-people; vaise-reside; yata-all; prabhu-darśane-in seeing Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vaiṣṇava-devotees of Lord Viṣṇu; haila-became; chāḍi'-giving up; nija-mata-own opinions.
translation: All the residents of Vidyānagara were of different faiths, but after seeing Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, they abandoned their own faiths and became Vaiṣṇavas.
